title: New: BLACK HONEY – The Taste (Demo)
content:
Whatsapp savy BLACK HONEY continue their assault of ‘demos’ with new track, The Taste.

Another grungey, 90’s sounding number, chuck a Gallagher brother on lead vocals, and you’d have a Brit-pop classic on your hands, albeit slightly heavier. Check out The Taste below, and drop them a text on +447578533359.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
